name: Crystalish
description:
You play as a small fish that is trying to find its home, but surrounded by marine debris can not cope with this task, help her overcome many interesting levels, but without letting the fish fall into the depths of the ocean.

Crystalish - A side-view game with a physical world where the player must destroy blocks in a certain amount while controlling the balance of the fish and not allowing it to fall off the screen.



Game Features:
- Visual style
- Physics
- Difficulty
